$interpreted: Terrified Commoner: What is that thing!?
Frightened Commoner: Help!!!!!!!!!!
Lazer: ...At least the child will be far from this chaos. For me, that is enough...
Diana: Lazer!?
Diana: I've just received news, in the New City——
Lazer: It's too late. Don't worry about it. Go back to the imperial palace. The further away from the New City the better.
Diana: ——Godfather, did you know of this!?
Diana: What have you and Devious been planning!?
Lazer: ......
Diana: The Blessing Ceremony for the construction of the New City...so this is why you didn't let me attend?
Diana: I am the Queen of this nation! How could you be so wicked, Godfather?
Lazer: ...You still don't understand, do you child?
Lazer: The Queen is finished, the body double, it's all just a mirage.
Lazer: Just close your eyes and wait. It will all be over soon, trust me.
Diana: I've always believed you, Godfather. It is you who doesn't believe me.
Diana: What are you doing just standing there? Think of a way to get those people out of there! Find out how many are injured!
Lazer: If you refuse to see the truth, then I'll shatter your illusion myself!
Lazer: Close your eyes and it will soon be over.
Diana: ...You dare strike a woman!? You planned on taking me out of the Desert Kingdom while I was unconscious!?
Lazer: That's right.
Diana: ...The only one not willing to face the truth is you, Godfather.
Diana: I may just be barely scraping by, but the Lazer Bernard that I once knew...is gone forever.
Diana: Leave, before I think less of you than I already do.
Lazer: ......
Lazer: ...So be it. In any case, there's no way you're getting inside the barrier of wind.
Diana: ......
Lazer: Pardon me for taking leave first, your Majesty.
Sophie: Rune! Are you hurt?
Rune: It's the wind...can't get through...
Charle: This wind barrier was created by Runes. There's no way we can get through with brute force alone.
Clark: Headmaster Ceres, are you saying what I think you're saying?
Charle: If this wind barrier was indeed created by the giant Rune that you spoke of, I'm afraid that the entire New City is completely sealed off.
Clark: Headmaster, even you don't know how to dismantle it?
Charle: That Rune does not exist in any system that has been deciphered to date. If I had to guess...
Charle: All Runes are a momentary change in the order of Soul Energy.
Charle: Even though it's a different Rune system, it is still based on Soul Energy, so there must be a way to change the structure.
Charle: If we find the weak point in the magic circle and manage to destroy it——
Clark: ——then we can dismantle the wind barrier?
Rune: I think I know...where it is.
Rune: Nikola said we must destroy the pond of lights that lies in front of the Shrine to stop Devious.
Clark: But we don't know if we can trust Nikola...
Sophie: This is an emergency and we've got no other leads. We've no choice but to check it out! Right, Rune?
Rune: Yeah!
Charle: But in the meantime, we'll need a way to help those trapped inside get out.
Sophie: Is there anything you can do?
Charle: If I put everything into it, I should be able to create a small path for a short period of time.
Hutchinson: All these monsters...I wonder how those inside are holding up?
Clark: Headmaster Ceres, how are you doing over there?
Charle: The wind barrier is much stronger than I imagined...
Charle: I'll stay here and do my best to maintain the crack, but there's no way I can make it to sunset.
Ru-yi: And if we stay inside until it gets dark?
Charle: The crack will close and nobody will be able to get out.
Sophie: ...Got it. We'll get back as soon as we can!
Diana: Wait!
Hanbei: ...The Lizard Queen?
Diana: This is an emergency. May we join you?

Model.Text: What is that thing!?
...At least the child will be far from this chaos. For me, that is enough...
Lazer!?
I've just received news, in the New City——
It's too late. Don't worry about it. Go back to the imperial palace. The further away from the New City the better.
——Godfather, did you know of this!?
What have you and Devious been planning!?
The Blessing Ceremony for the construction of the New City...so this is why you didn't let me attend?
I am the Queen of this nation! How could you be so wicked, Godfather?
...You still don't understand, do you child?
The Queen is finished, the body double, it's all just a mirage.
Just close your eyes and wait. It will all be over soon, trust me.
I've always believed you, Godfather. It is you who doesn't believe me.
What are you doing just standing there? Think of a way to get those people out of there! Find out how many are injured!
If you refuse to see the truth, then I'll shatter your illusion myself!
Close your eyes and it will soon be over.
...You dare strike a woman!? You planned on taking me out of the Desert Kingdom while I was unconscious!?
That's right.
...The only one not willing to face the truth is you, Godfather.
I may just be barely scraping by, but the Lazer Bernard that I once knew...is gone forever.
Leave, before I think less of you than I already do.
...So be it. In any case, there's no way you're getting inside the barrier of wind.
Pardon me for taking leave first, your Majesty.
Rune! Are you hurt?
It's the wind...can't get through...
This wind barrier was created by Runes. There's no way we can get through with brute force alone.
Headmaster Ceres, are you saying what I think you're saying?
If this wind barrier was indeed created by the giant Rune that you spoke of, I'm afraid that the entire New City is completely sealed off.

That Rune does not exist in any system that has been deciphered to date. If I had to guess...
All Runes are a momentary change in the order of Soul Energy.
Even though it's a different Rune system, it is still based on Soul Energy, so there must be a way to change the structure.
If we find the weak point in the magic circle and manage to destroy it——
——then we can dismantle the wind barrier?
I think I know...where it is.
Nikola said we must destroy the pond of lights that lies in front of the Shrine to stop Devious.
But we don't know if we can trust Nikola...
This is an emergency and we've got no other leads. We've no choice but to check it out! Right, Rune?
Yeah!
But in the meantime, we'll need a way to help those trapped inside get out.
Is there anything you can do?
If I put everything into it, I should be able to create a small path for a short period of time.
All these monsters...I wonder how those inside are holding up?
Headmaster Ceres, how are you doing over there?
The wind barrier is much stronger than I imagined...
I'll stay here and do my best to maintain the crack, but there's no way I can make it to sunset.
And if we stay inside until it gets dark?
The crack will close and nobody will be able to get out.
...Got it. We'll get back as soon as we can!
Wait!
...The Lizard Queen?
This is an emergency. May we join you?
